p: The essential oil of this plant has been tested on boar sperm during 2 days of semen storage at 17 Â°C [ 76]. All the concentrations used (0.001-1%) were detrimental for sperm parameters. The authors concluded that the essential oil from this plant is unsuitable for boar sperm preservation due to its cytotoxicity. In addition, the concentrations tested had no inhibitory effect on Escherichia coli and Pseudomonas aeruginosa growth.
